page.title: 07Recreation
page.content: Most people go to Billing Aquadrome for facilities such as fair-ground rides, outdoor swimming pools, water- sports, and the amusement arcade. There are large picnic areas and caravanparks at the Aquadrome. There is also good fishing in the River Nene. There are recreational facilities for senior citizens, youth groups, mums and toddlers, and other residents at the Community Centres at Bellinge and Ecton Brook. Small play areas for children can be found on the development housing estates at Bellinge.
